latestVersion.versionNote: Complete version of study, with updated cataloging information, released on December 7, 2014

fields.value: Is There a Culture War? Conflicting Value Structures in American Public Opinion

dsDescriptionValue.value: Datasets, R package, and R scripts to replicate analyses in Jacoby, William G. (2014) "Is There a Culture War? Conflicting Value Structures in American Public Opinion." American Political Science Review 108(4): 754-771. DOI: http://dx.doi.org.proxy1.cl.msu.edu/10.1017/S0003055414000380

publicationCitation.value: Jacoby, William G. (2014) "Is There a Culture War? Conflicting Value Structures in American Public Opinion." American Political Science Review 108(4): 754-771. DOI: http://dx.doi.org.proxy1.cl.msu.edu/10.1017/S0003055414000380

files.description: Stata dataset containing the same information as "circreg.sas7bdat"

categories: V. Files Used to Create Table 3 and Figure 5

dataFile.description: Stata dataset containing the same information as "circreg.sas7bdat"

files.description: SAS dataset containing variables and observations extracted from "msu_common_cces_dataset.sas7bdat" in order to perform the circular regression reported in Table 3 and to construct Figure 5.
files.label: circreg.sas7bdat
categories: V. Files Used to Create Table 3 and Figure 5

dataFile.description: SAS dataset containing variables and observations extracted from "msu_common_cces_dataset.sas7bdat" in order to perform the circular regression reported in Table 3 and to construct Figure 5.

files.description: File containing R session that uses data from         "relig.dta" to create Figures 3A and 3B, and         perform analysis of angular variation (ANAVA) on religious denominations and the four-category version of the religious commitment variable.
files.label: Create Figure 3.R
categories: III. Files Used to Create Figure 3

dataFile.description: File containing R session that uses data from         "relig.dta" to create Figures 3A and 3B, and         perform analysis of angular variation (ANAVA) on religious denominations and the four-category version of the religious commitment variable.

files.description: File containing R session that uses data from         "info.dta" to create Figures 4A and 4B, and         perform analysis of angular variation (ANAVA) on three-category versions of party identification and ideological self-placement variables.
files.label: Create Figure 4.R
categories: IV. Files Used to Create Figure 4

dataFile.description: File containing R session that uses data from         "info.dta" to create Figures 4A and 4B, and         perform analysis of angular variation (ANAVA) on three-category versions of party identification and ideological self-placement variables.

files.description: R session to estimate vector model from 2006 CCES data on value importance rankings. Uses data contained in file "ranked values, with names.txt" and requires "optiscale" package, stored in "optiscale_1.0-4.tar.gz". This R session also writes the data that are contained in file "row vectors.txt".
files.label: Estim Nonmet Vector Model.R
categories: II. Estimate the Nonmetric MDPREF Model

dataFile.description: R session to estimate vector model from 2006 CCES data on value importance rankings. Uses data contained in file "ranked values, with names.txt" and requires "optiscale" package, stored in "optiscale_1.0-4.tar.gz". This R session also writes the data that are contained in file "row vectors.txt".
